title: DSA Level 3 â€” Strings & Basic Hashing
concept: Classic string operations: frequency, palindromes, anagrams, sliding window on strings.

challenges.title: Check Palindrome String
challenges.description: Given a string S, determine if it is a palindrome. Print "YES" or "NO".

challenges.title: Count Character Frequency
challenges.description: Given a string S consisting of lowercase English letters, count the frequency of each character and print them in increasing order of character.
challenges.outputDescription: For each character c that appears, print: c count.

challenges.title: Anagram Check
challenges.description: Given two strings A and B, check if they are anagrams. Print "YES" or "NO".
challenges.inputDescription: First line: A. Second line: B.
challenges.outputDescription: "YES" if A and B are anagrams, else "NO".

challenges.title: First Non-Repeating Character
challenges.description: Given a string S, find the first character that does not repeat. If none, print -1.

challenges.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
challenges.description: Given a string S, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

challenges.title: Count Vowels and Consonants
challenges.description: Given a lowercase English string S, count vowels and consonants.

challenges.title: Rotate String by K
challenges.description: Perform a left rotation of string S by K positions (cyclic).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: S. Second line: integer K.

challenges.title: Check Subsequence
challenges.description: Check if S is a subsequence of T.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: S. Second line: T.

challenges.title: Longest Common Prefix of Strings
challenges.description: Given N strings, find the longest common prefix.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Next N lines: strings.
challenges.outputDescription: The longest common prefix (may be empty).
examples:
Input:
3
flower
flow
flight

Output:
fl

challenges.title: Smallest Window Containing All Characters
challenges.description: Given S and P, find the length of the smallest substring of S that contains all characters of P (with frequencies). If none, print -1.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: S. Second line: P.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: length of smallest window or -1.
